title: Slow Cooker Macaroni and Cheese II

instructions.1: Combine in slow cooker: evaporated milk, paprika, salt, egg, butter and cheese; stir. Cook on high for 1 hour.
instructions.2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add macaroni and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
instructions.3: Stir cooked macaroni into cheese sauce, reduce temperature to low and cook for 3 to 5 hours.

questions.question: In Step 3, is the cheese from Step 1 being used?
Is cheese from Step 1 used in multiple future steps without being redefined?
Is cheese from Step 1 still available in Step 3?
What is the last time interval specified in Step 2?
If we skip Step 1, is it still valid to use the cheese in Step 3?
Can we combine (Step 1) and bring (Step 2) at the same time?
